tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: STONERS, COSPLAY, HONOR KILLINGS
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Hey Nation. I love your faces :) Thanks for watching my Tuesday Show *Links and Description type things down below* In today's show we talk about Michael Clarke Duncan, a woman in Turkey being a bad ass, the DNC, easy mode ruining video games, and everything else that mattered to me. Our new Forums!! phillyd.tv Get some PhillyD Merch!! forhumanpeoples.com Check out Today's SourceFed bit.ly ---------------------------- ALL of today's Stories: Michael Clarke Duncan Passed Away: chzb.gr BAMwtF of the Day: gaw.kr Kal Penn Hosting the DNC: bit.ly Federal Punishments for Marijuana: bit.ly The Government is Monitoring your Torrents: bit.ly DragonCon Galleries: bit.ly Does Easy Mode Ruin Games? bit.ly ---------------------------- Philly D OFFICIAL APP: bit.ly FACEBOOK: on.fb.me TWITTER: Twitter.com INSTAGRAM: @phillydefranco WEBSITE: phillyd.tv GOOGLE+ bit.ly music by: Ronald Jenkees: bit.ly @hagemeister @urbandelights

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Weed legal for 18 years and older cause﻿ of what drugs do to kids
decriminalize everything, legalize and tax certain things. I bought two posters today, super excited﻿ to get them :B]
If no harm is done to anyone, I believe it﻿ is not a crime.
i﻿ find skyrim too easy sometimes
I'm in the military, can't﻿ have a opinion on that. lol
Bad Ass﻿ Mother What The Fucker.
Tax weed make money for﻿ things we need.

It's difficult to ask the general public a question about﻿ legalization when most of them have no idea of the health issues or risks associated with the drugs.
I personally don't believe we need to legalize marijuana, which is much more damaging to the body than cigarettes.....
Weed is about a s dangerous﻿ as peanuts, maybe peanuts are more dangerous since you can choke on them but hey. Why not legalise it? No benefits to keeping people in jail.
Please for the love of the big M give me﻿ an xbox XD
How about cut maybe a 1/4 of the u.s﻿ military budget and then maybe like fix a lot of problems?
Please for the love of the big M give me an﻿ xbox XD

Reviewer.Books: sci fi, fantasy, shit like that lol
Reviewer.Music: screemo(winds of plague, bullet for my valentine, a day to remember, etc.), metal, rock(60s, 70s, 80s, 90s), techno(rave!!!), alternative

Reviewer.Job: runnin the MUTHA FUKIN STREETS B!

Reviewer.Books: Percy Jackson Skulduggery Pleasant Artemis Fowl
